description: Distinct even numbers in the numerators of the 1/3-Pascal triangle (by row).
links: Peter J. C. Moses, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: thirdPascal[1]={1}; thirdPascal[2]={1,1}; thirdPascal[3]={1,1/3,1}; thirdPascal[n_] := thirdPascal[n] = Join[{1}, Map[Total, Partition[thirdPascal[n-1], 2, 1]], {1}]; DeleteDuplicates[Flatten[Table[Select[Numerator[thirdPascal[n]], EvenQ], {n, 20}]]]
author: _Mohammad K. Azarian_
